---

## API Endpoints (Phase 8)

| Endpoint | Method | Purpose |
|----------|--------|---------|
| `/api/config` | GET/POST | Get/update configuration |
| `/api/code/execute` | POST | Execute code |
| `/api/code/validate` | POST | Validate syntax |
| `/api/keywords` | GET | Get keywords list |
| `/api/template` | GET | Get templates |
| `/api/export` | GET | Export configuration |
| `/api/community/languages` | GET | Get community languages |

### User System:
- User registration with profiles
- Language publication
- 5-star rating system
- Review aggregation
- Download tracking

---

## Debugging System (Phase 8)

### Features:
- Conditional breakpoints
- Hit counting
- Line-by-line stepping
- Variable inspection
- Call stack tracking
- Execution tracing
- Full state snapshots

### Methods:
- `set_breakpoint()` - Set conditional breakpoints
- `step_through_code()` - Execute with tracing
- `inspect_variables()` - Monitor variables
- `init_debugger()` - Initialize system

---

## Sandbox Execution (Phase 8)

### Security:
- Restricted builtins (no dangerous imports)
- Execution timeout enforcement
- Memory limit configuration
- Process limit control
- Output isolation
- Error sandboxing

### Capabilities:
- Single-instance execution
- Multi-instance distributed
- Timeout enforcement (default 5s)
- Memory tracking (256MB default)
- Output capture
- Performance timing

## Performance Characteristics

### Execution:
- Simple code: <100Î¼s
- Average code: <1ms
- Complex code: <5s (timeout default)

### Memory:
- IDE baseline: ~50MB
- Per-config: <1MB
- Per-sandbox: 256MB (configurable)

### Web:
- API responses: <100ms
- Code execution: <5s timeout
- Concurrent: Up to 10 instances
